original_title: Spike and Mike's Sick and Twisted Festival of Animation: Caught in the Act
overview: Get ready for another outbreak of outrageous shorts from Spike & Mike’s Sick & Twisted Festival of Animation - the touring film festival that began as a prelude to rock concerts 25 years ago. Always wild & audacious, these groundbreaking films raise the bar for animated shorts and offer a million laughs on the way. This set includes Happy Tree Friends: Milkin’ It and Here Comes Dr. Tran, which requires the use of 3-D glasses (included in set).
title: Spike and Mike's Sick and Twisted Festival of Animation: Caught in the Act
